productDesc: Pearl Henna Powder nourishes scalp & hair and acts as a good conditioner for hair to help it grow faster.
The antifungal properties of pearl shikakai powder nourishes scalp and prevents itching and dryness. The natural ingredients of shikakai make hair softer and add a beautiful shine to it.
Peel Powder protects against UVB rays and treats hyperpigmentation, acne, signs of aging, and wound healing.
